title: Terra Blade
summaries: The Terra Blade is a Hardmode projectile sword which becomes available after defeating (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Plantera / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) one mechanical boss.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Terra Blade fires a wide green slash wave projectile with each swing. It also has a large aura of energy around the blade when swung, which significantly increases the range at which the weapon can deal damage to enemies, including coverage behind the player. The projectile deals 100% base damage at first and pierces an infinite amount of targets before applying a 25% damage penalty for each target it pierces. The projectile will disappear after 1.5 seconds, upon hitting a solid block, or when its damage falls to 0 after piercing. If the blade, its aura, or its projectile strikes an enemy, a green flash is created.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the Terra Blade fires a green sword-shaped projectile when swung, which costs neither mana nor ammunition, deals 125% base damage, and can pierce through two enemies, dissipating after hitting a third enemy or a wall. The projectile can travel up to 5000 feet (2500 tiles) at a speed of 61 mph. The fire rate and velocity of the projectile can be increased by melee speed bonuses.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, it is later used to craft the <linked>Zenith</linked>, which is the strongest melee weapon in the game. On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, the Terra Blade itself is one of the strongest swords in the game.
